name: Ordleik
overview: Inspired by Wordzap, your purpose is to arrange words from the initial random letters. Unlike Wordzap which is a 2-player oriented game, you play against the clock to get the highest possible score. Your task is to arrange as many words as possible before the time runs out. Features: * 3 modes of play. EasyZap: You can choose freely from any of the letters. WordZap: You can only choose letters adjacent to an open square. BagoZap: You can choose letters near the last one selected (also diagonally). * Dictionaries in 3 languages: English, Norwegian and German. * High score saving, each game mode has a top 50 high score list, including date of achievement.
